A.text: Every CTE teacher has the appropriate credential for teaching the subject(s) assigned as well as documented employment experience outside of education in the program area taught.

B.text: Based on the previous yearâ€™s records, every CTE teacher, teaching at least half time CTE, attends a minimum of four professional development activities.
evidence: List of Teacher Technical Development Activities Such as Staff Exchange, Technical Conferences, Industry Certification Training, Etc.

C.text: The CTE staff meets a minimum of twice a month. (This criteria does not apply to single person departments - mark column N/A = Not Applicable.)

D.text: A written record of minutes of action taken during CTE staff meetings is kept in Department files.
